name: The Uncanniest Of Hosts
description:
The darkness cannot be overcome but only escaped - temporarily.

Play by interacting with each door and hope you do not awaken the all encompassing darkness;  the darkness that creates extreme dread all around you and breaks your morale.

Your aim is to find the exit, but you will not escape without a key.  

Find it before the darkness takes your morale and you remain trapped in this place forever.

THIS IS AN EARLY ACCESS PLAYABLE DEMO - SO CONSIDER LIKING ON YOU TUBE (WILL BE UP SOON) AND ON THIS SITE AS THIS WILL INFLUENCE WHETHER THE GAME GETS DEVELOPED FURTHER

WARNING: CONTAINS SOME FLASHING IMAGES
